class.name: OpenXRMarkerTracker
class.brief_description: Spatial entity tracker for our spatial entity marker tracking extension.
class.description: Spatial entity tracker for our OpenXR spatial entity marker tracking extension. These trackers identify entities in our real space detected by a visual marker such as a QRCode or Aruco code, and map their location to our virtual space.

method.name: get_marker_data
method.description: Returns the marker data for this marker. This can return a [String] or [PackedByteArray]. Only applicable to QR Code based markers.

method.name: set_marker_data
method.description: Sets the marker data for this marker. [b]Note:[/b] This should only be set by marker discovery logic.

members.member: The bounds size for this marker.
The marker ID for this marker, this is only returned for Aruco and April Tag markers. Call [method get_marker_data] for QRCode markers.
